function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncalibrated infective quantum q in the modified model based on limited data from a single representative case","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation results leading to ineffective disease propagation mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Collect more comprehensive and diverse data sources for model calibration","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis software, statistical modeling tools","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, risk experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccurate estimation of the distance between passengers on the bus","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to incorrect spatial parameters","Mitigation":"Use precise measurement tools and methods for determining passenger distances","Technologies":"Laser distance meters, computer-aided design (CAD) software for spatial analysis","People":"Transportation authorities, safety regulators, bus operators","Owner":"Transportation agencies, safety organizations"},{"Description":"Uncalculated or misestimated ventilation rate on the bus","Impact":"Ineffective air circulation leading to higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough assessment of bus ventilation systems and airflow dynamics","Technologies":"Airflow measurement devices, computational fluid dynamics (CFD) software for airflow analysis","People":"HVAC engineers, bus manufacturers, public health officials","Owner":"Transportation agencies, bus operators"}]}
